title: annaiyum tandaiyum
sahitya:
annaiyum tandaiyum tAnE pAril aNDa carAcaram kaN kaNDa deivam


caraNam 1   tAyinum kOvilingEdu tandai shol mikkadOr mantiramEdu
 shEyin kaDan annai toNDu puNya tIrthamum mUrti sthalamidil uNDu
				(toghaiyarA)
 tAyuDan tandaiyin pAlum enrum talai vaNangAdavan nAl tavarAmal
 kOyilil shenru enna kANbAn nanda gOpAlan vENDum varam taruvAnO
  caraNam 2    ponnuDan tan poruL bhUmi peNDir puttirarum pugazh ittarai vAzhvum
 annai pitA inri Edu maram Ayin vidaiyinri kAi kani Edu
